roleset.name: (cause to) move more slowly

example.text: A reinstatement of the uptick rule for program traders would slow their activity considerably.

example.text: As well, digoxin has important effects on the autonomic nervous system, including a vagotonic property that accounts for its slowing of heart rate.

example.text: Activity-1 continued *trace*-1 to slow from the hectic pace set during the market's plunge late Friday and its rebound Monday, as players began to set their sights on events coming later this week.

as players began to set their sights on events coming later this week

example.text: While it has predicted that overall growth in unit sales of personal computers is slowing to about a 10% yearly rate...
